Differential Equations | The Laplace Transform of a piecewise function.

Laplace Transform of a piecewise function\n[imath]\mathcal{L}\left(\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\nt & \text { if } 0 \leq t<1 \\\nt^{2} & \text { if } t \geq 1\n\end{array}\right)\right.[/imath][imath]t & \text { if } 0 \leq t<1 [/imath] [imath]t^{2} & \text { if } t \geq 1[/imath]
